name: mac
description: The phone MAC address in IEEE 802 notation, e.g. `11-22-33-AA-BB-CC`

name: short_mac
description: The phone MAC address in hexadecimal notation, e.g. `112233aabbcc`

name: model
description: The parent scope identifier (model)

name: sip_tls_port
description: TCP port number of the PBX host that phones connect to with SIPS protocol.

name: sip_udp_port
description: UDP port number of the PBX host that phones connect to with SIP protocol.

name: hostname
description: Host name or IP address of the PBX host.

name: timezone
description: Local timezone of the phone.  - Must be a valid TZ database entry (https://www.iana.org/time-zones). Run `timedatectl list-timezones` for a list of valid strings.

name: tonezone
description: Local tones code for the call state (busy, ringing, off-hook?). Must be an ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (e.g. `it`, `es`, `gb`?)

name: language
description: Phone UI language. Must be an ISO 639-1 language code (e.g. `it`, `en`...)

name: ntp_server
description: Host name or IP address of the network time (NTP) server.

name: ringtone
description: Ringtone type selector. 0 == silent, -1 => use ringtone_file, >0 phone builtin ringtone. See also cap_ringtone_count.

name: ringtone_file
description: Name of a file under the `ringtones/` directory, e.g. `mymusic.wav`. If the file does not exist an empty string is forcibly returned.

name: account_dtmf_type
description: Type of DTMF transport.

name: account_encryption
description: If true, use SIPS and RTP encryption.

name: account_display_name
description: SIP line and account label for the phone UI

name: account_username
description: SIP user name.

name: account_password
description: SIP password.

name: account_extension
description: The extension number of the account.

name: account_always_fwd_target
description: Unconditionally forward incoming calls to the given extension. Set to empty string to disable.

name: account_busy_fwd_target
description: If busy, forward incoming calls to the given extension. Set to empty string to disable.

name: account_timeout_fwd_target
description: If not answered, forward incoming calls to the given extension. Set to empty string to disable.

name: account_dnd_enable
description: Do not disturb switch.

name: account_call_waiting
description: Account call waiting

name: account_cftimeout
description: Timeout for the account call forward

name: account_voicemail
description: Voicemail function/service code.

name: account_dnd_allow
description: Grant the phone user to change DnD status.

name: account_fwd_allow
description: Grant the phone user to change the call forward setting.

name: cftimeout
description: Wait the given number of seconds until the call forward is considered not answered.

name: cfalwayson
description: Function/service code to enable unconditioned call forward.

name: cfalwaysoff
description: Function/service code to disable unconditioned call forward.

name: cfbusyon
description: Function/service code to enable call forward on busy.

name: cfbusyoff
description: Function/service code to disable call forward on busy.

name: cftimeouton
description: Function/service code to enable call forward on busy after timeout.

name: cftimeoutoff
description: Function/service code to disable call forward on busy after timeout.

name: dndon
description: Function/service code to enable DnD

name: dndoff
description: Function/service code to disable DnD

name: dndtoggle
description: Function/service code to toggle DnD state. If enabled turn it disabled and vice-versa.

name: queuetoggle
description: Function/service code

name: call_waiting_tone
description: Emit a tone when a call is waiting.

name: call_waiting_off
description: Function/service code to disable the call waiting tone.

name: call_waiting_on
description: Function/service code to enable the call waiting tone.

name: pickup_group
description: Group pickup code.

name: pickup_direct
description: Direct pickup code.

name: vlan_id_phone
description: VLAN VID for phone ethernet port.

name: vlan_id_pcport
description: VLAN VID for PC/DATA ethernet port.

name: date_format
description: Date display format in the phone UI
domain: one of ``,`DD MM YY`, `DD MM YYYY`, `DD MMM WW`, `DD MMM YY`, `DD MMM YYYY`, `WWW DD MMM`, `WWW MMM DD`, `MM DD YY`, `MM DD YYYY`, `MMM DD WW`, `YY MM DD`, `YYYY MM DD`

name: cap_date_format_blacklist
description: List of valid date_format values not supported by the phone. Must be a comma separated list of values among those allowed for `date_format`.

name: time_format
description: Time display format in the phone UI

name: ldap_server
description: Host name or IP address of the LDAP phonebook server.

name: ldap_port
description: TCP port number of the LDAP phonebook server. Required if different than the usual 389 (ldap) and 636 (ldaps).

name: ldap_tls
description: Enable and set the TLS method for LDAP connections.

name: cap_ldap_tls_blacklist
description: List of valid ldap_tls values that are not supported by the phone LDAP client library.

name: ldap_user
description: LDAP user name if authentication is required.

name: ldap_password
description: LDAP password if authentication is required.

name: ldap_base
description: istinguished Name for search base; e.g. `dc=phonebook,dc=example,dc=com`

name: ldap_name_display
description: Template string for displaying the contact name. The string can use %-prefixed placeholders that refer to the selected LDAP entry attributes, e.g. `%cn %o`

name: ldap_mainphone_number_attr
description: LDAP entry attribute with the contact main phone number.

name: ldap_mobilephone_number_attr
description: LDAP entry attribute with the contact mobile phone number.

name: ldap_otherphone_number_attr
description: LDAP entry attribute with the contact additional phone number.

name: ldap_name_attr
description: LDAP attributes list (space separated) containing the contact name part(s), e.g. `cn o`

name: ldap_number_filter
description: LDAP search by number filter. The placeholder `%` is replaced by the number to search.

name: ldap_name_filter
description: LDAP search by name filter. The placeholder `%` is replaced by the name to search.

name: dss_transfer
description: Call transfer mode.

name: cap_dss_transfer_blacklist
description: Comma separate list of `dss_transfer` modes that are not supported by the phone.

name: adminpw
description: Phone and web UI admin password.

name: userpw
description: Phone and web UI user password.

name: provisioning_complete
description: The provisioning is considered complete when the phone uses `tok2` for authentication. The temporary `tok1` token is invalidated.

name: provisioning_url_scheme
description: URI scheme to fetch the provisioning resources.

name: provisioning_url_path
description: Basic URI path component, that is prefixed to the security token and file name components, e.g. `/provisioning/`.

name: provisioning_url_filename
description: URI file name component. It can be empty for some phones, or correspond to the literal phone MAC address, MAC placeholders or whatever.

name: provisioning_freq
description: Set how often the phone requests the provisioning file.

name: provisioning_url1
description: This is a complete provisioning URI, obtained from the scheme, hostname, path, tok2 and filename parts.

name: provisioning_url2
description: This is a complete provisioning URI, obtained from the scheme, hostname, path, tok1 and filename parts.

name: tok1
description: Temporary authentication token. It is invalidated once tok2 is used for the first time.

name: tok2
description: Final authentication token. Once it is used, tok1 is invalidated.

name: firmware_file
description: Name of a file under the `firmware/` directory, e.g. `myrom-1.2.3b.z`. If the file does not exist an empty string is forcibly returned.

name: softkey_type
description: Soft key type/function code. See the appropriate section.

name: softkey_label
description: Soft key label string. Some soft key types may allow to customize the soft key label.

name: softkey_value
description: Soft key value string. The meaning and the fact of being compulsory depends on the soft key type.

name: linekey_type
description: Line key type/function code. See the appropriate section.

name: linekey_value
description: Line key value string. The meaning and the fact of being compulsory depends on the line key type.

name: linekey_label
description: Line key label string. Some line key types may allow to customize the line key label.

name: expkey_type
description: Expansion key type. See the `softkey_type` description for more information.

name: expkey_label
description: Expansion label. See the `softkey_label` description for more information.

name: expkey_value
description: Expansion key value. See the `softkey_value` description for more information.

name: background_file
description: Name of a file under the `backgrounds/` directory, e.g. `mywallpaper.png`. If the file does not exist an empty string is forcibly returned.

name: screensaver_file
description: Name of a file under the `screensavers/` directory, e.g. `mywallpaper.png`. If the file does not exist an empty string is forcibly returned.

name: backlight_time
description: Seconds before the phone backlight goes off.
domain: 0 = never goes off, N > 0 is the number of seconds to wait among the allowed values: 3, 5, 7, 10, 15, 30, 60, 120, 300, 600, 1200 ,1800, 2400, 3000, 3600.

name: screensaver_time
description: Seconds the screen saver starts.
domain: 0 = never starts, N > 0 is the number of seconds to wait among the allowed values: 3, 5, 7, 10, 15, 30, 60, 120, 300, 600, 1200 ,1800, 2400, 3000, 3600.

name: contrast
description: Set a custom contrast for phone display.

name: brightness
description: Set a custom brightness for phone display.

name: cap_linekey_count
description: Number of line keys available in the phone.

name: cap_linekey_type_blacklist
description: Comma separated list of `linekey_type` values, not allowed by the phone.

name: cap_softkey_count
description: Number of soft keys available in the phone.

name: cap_softkey_type_blacklist
description: Comma separated list of `softkey_type` values, not allowed by the phone.

name: cap_expkey_count
description: Number of expansion keys available in a single expansion module.

name: cap_expkey_type_blacklist
description: Comma separated list of `expkey_type` values, not allowed by the phone.

name: cap_ringtone_count
description: Number of ringtones supported by the phone.

name: cap_ringtone_blacklist
description: Comma separated list of ringtone identifiers not supported by the phone. E.g. `-1` (custom ringtone)

name: cap_expmodule_count
description: Number of pluggable expansion modules.

name: cap_contrast
description: Capability to change display contrast.

name: cap_screensaver_file
description: Capability to use a custom screensaver.

name: cap_background_file
description: Capability to use a custom background. boolean

name: cap_backlight_time_blacklist
description: Comma separated list of [backlight_time](#backlight_time) values not supported by the phone

name: cap_screensaver_time_blacklist
description: Comma separated list of [screensaver_time](#screensaver_time) values not supported by the phone.

name: cap_brightness
description: Capability to set a custom brightness.
